data.title: Burnout Dominator
data.meta_description:
I only have 1 thing to say about this game:

Where are the crash challenges?!?!?!!?! That was the best part of the games and they took it out.
data.meta_site_name: GBAtemp.net - The Independent Video Game Community

#4

Burnout Revenge concentrated on destruction (loads of crash modes), so they're trying something different with Burnout Dominator, they're concentrating more on the racing aspect.

Maybe the next game will have lots of races and crashes, I think they just want to see what kind of game people prefer.

#10

Been playing this on the PSP. Personally I think the series peaked at Burnout 3.

Burnout 1 = Hey this is kinda interesting

Burnout 2 = Hmm, crash mode.....

Burnout 3 = OMG OMG OMG OMG OMG

Anything after that they just made the cars shinier and sleeker but nothing new to the gameplay.... apart from those terrible EA Trax songs. I'm just glad the Xbox versions lets you change the soundtrack.

#11

I'm playing Burnout Dominator on my PSP at the moment. I'm not missing the crash mode because I never liked it though

It's a pretty good game but it makes you feel like you have A.D.D. with the menus and car selection screen. Geebus, this game looks like it was made by the same people who brought us the MTV Xbox360 unveiling event.
